name: cerply-cursor-starter-v2-refresh
description: Cerply v4.1 - Curator + Adaptive + Trust Labels + Analytics

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm -w api run dev" "npm -w web run dev"
scripts.build: npm -w api run build && npm -w web run build
scripts.typecheck: npm -w api run typecheck && npm -w web run typecheck
